returns._0: interest as a number of debt tokens

params.loanToCollateral: debt tokens per collateral token pledged

approve(address,uint256).notice: approve transfer of loan ownership to new address

clear(uint256).notice: fill a requested loan as a lender

collateralFor(uint256,uint256).notice: compute collateral needed for loan amount at given loan to collateral ratio

defaulted(uint256).notice: send collateral to lender upon default

interestFor(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: compute interest cost on amount for duration at given annualized rate

isActive(uint256).notice: check if given request is active

isDefaulted(uint256).notice: check if given loan is in default

repay(uint256,uint256).notice: repay a loan to recoup collateral

request(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: request a loan with given parameterscollateral is taken at time of request

rescind(uint256).notice: cancel a loan request and return collateral

roll(uint256).notice: roll a loan overuses terms from request

transfer(uint256).notice: execute approved transfer of loan ownership

         for a specific user and debt-collateral pair.
